name: Ten People Ten Colors
description: ‎An action puzzle game where you manipulate colors. PEOPLE suddenly wondered into a colorful world... Save PEOPLE as they run for their lives.

name: SM64 GBA
description:
SM64 GBA is a non-profit fan project which aims to make a port of Super Mario 64 (along with new features, like new characters) for the Game Boy Advance. The project was started as a means of testing and improving how 3D games can be developed for the Game Boy Advance architecture, a capability that only a few commercial games made use of.

The game is still in development, but isn't currently intended to be released officially by the creator.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Cleanup Crew: Employee Assessment Teaser
description: Hide from animatronics and sneak your way through environments on the exciting Story Mode, discovering the deepest and darkest secrets that lurk within a mysterious partner to Fazbear Entertainment.

name: Garrulismo
description: Garrulismo is a Doom II megawad created by Eye del Cul. It contains 32 maps and was first released on October 16, 2003. Its title is Spanish and can be loosely translated to "thuggery", and the mod's irreverent tone contains many references to popular Spanish media and pop culture, seen most prominently in its humorous story. The title screen features popular Spanish singer José Luis Cantero Rada and comedian Chiquito de la Calzada.

name: Hispanic Community Project
description: Hispanic Community Project {HCP} is a boom-format megawad inspired by Doom 2 In Spain Only and JPCP made by members of the hispanic doom community and spanish-speaking mappers. Thanks to @OceanMadman for the project's idea!

name: Date with Modeus
description:
Let me ask you this:
"Do you want to have a lovely date with Modeus? "
Well... In this silly little Visual Novel game, You can do just that :D

name: FM7X: Continental Odyssey
description: Continental Odyssey, a full-fledged episode consisting of 7 single player levels, 2 of these are secret and 4 are multiplayer-only.

name: Memetomo
description: A turn-based card battle game with RPG elements, in which you must use more than 140 cat cards to win battles and become a “cat meme master”!

name: Monster Town Defense
description: Monster town is a resource management RTS game, where you build a town of monsters, developed technology through researches, build defenses equipment and monster troops to attack the opponent town to reclaim the glory of the monster.

name: Knighttron
description: The hero wakes up in a world of infected dark magic and cannot remember anything, including his own name. Guide the hero in his journey to recover his memories while battling through hordes of aggressive enemies. Fight, trade, loot and complete quests to enlist the support of new allies. Who knows what secrets lay hidden in this world? Enjoy hours of exciting gameplay in this curious world of both might & magic. Control parties of up to three characters in this turn-based strategy adventure!

name: Traveling Union
description: A 2.5D RPG in pre-alpha public access. Built using the Bakin Engine.

name: Marvel Vs Capcom 2 X-Men '97 Edition Deluxe Arcade
description: Marvel Vs Capcom 2 X-Men '97 Edition Deluxe Arcade is an arcade machine produced by Arcade1Up which bundles in the games Marvel vs Capcom, Marvel vs Capcom 2, Marvel Super Heroes vs Street Fighter, X-Men vs Street Fighter, Marvel Super Heroes, X-Men: Children of the Atom, X-Men: Mutant Apocalypse and Marvel Superheroes in War of the Gems.

name: Mega Man Collection
description: Mega Man Collection is a plug n play game bundle of the Mega Man series by Arcade1Up. The bundle features the first 6 Mega Man games.

name: Contact
description:
Contact is a visual novel where you play as Mike, who comes to see his grandmother in the summer. She runs a local store, but things are not going as she did a few years ago.
Mike decides to help her grandmother restore her household and meet her old friends simultaneously.

name: Ashunnor's Game
description: A short, fully hand-drawn visual novel about the magical fantasy kingdom of Thrungia.

name: Aquatic Supermarket Simulator
description: Dive into the vibrant world of aquatic retail with Aquatic Store Simulator! Take on the challenge of managing your underwater-themed supermarket, blending business management with the beauty of marine life. Stock shelves with exotic fish, decorations, set prices, take payments and maintain aquariums.

name: Find Cats 3
description: “A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”

name: Storm Cleaner
description:
Action Cozy meet Hidden Object games.

You are a Storm Cleaner. After a storm left an island, you will visit them and organize everythings to their original position.

name: The Wicked Witch of the West
description: Sin descripción

name: Bear in Venice
description: Sin descripción

name: I Klopi tou Krasiou
description: When the carnival of Potamia is once more up against conditions of sabotage, Nionios, the carnival mascot will have to save the day, with the help of the association, and this year with yours as well!

name: Oreo Pac-Man
description: Oreo Pac-Man is a promotional web browser game made in collaboration between Oreo and Bandai Namco. The game was made to promote Pac-Man themed Oreo cooked and the Oreo Pac-Man contest, in which the participants have a chance to win a trip to Japan or an Arcade1UP arcade machine, with European regions also having the additional prize of a mini LCD arcade game for the promotion. Current it has only been released within Europe, Australia and New Zealand.

name: Pinochestein 3D
description: First-Person Shooter based off a standalone version of the Zandronum engine.

name: Oreo Pac-Man Game Keyring
description: The Oreo Pac-Man Game Keyring is an LCD Pac-Man game that was given away during the Oreo Pac-Man campaign exclusively in European regions. The game itself is a port of the original Pac-Man game.

name: Mini Arcade Oreo Pac-Man
description: The Mini Arcade Oreo Pac-Man is a prize game given out during the Oreo Pac-Man promotional campaign only in European regions. The game is a mini arcade cabinet port of the original Pac-Man.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Tyranid Elites
description: Sin descripción

name: Cold as Hell
description: Cold as Hell is a total conversion for Doom II set in a fictional military research facility in Greenland in the 1950's.

name: SamOrai
description: The samOrai of the school of the first dawn, must wipe out all the demons born from the souls of the miserable. Join him throughout his adventures, defeating enemies in more than 20 scenarios and with more than 10 outfits. Casual hack-and-slash game where you can compete with other users to reach the top of the leaderboards.

name: SCP: Containment Breach Multiplayer
description: Multiplayer survival horror game based on stories from the SCP Foundation. The game is about a facility containing anomalous entities known as SCPs. When a catastrophic containment breach occurs at one of the facilities, it is your main goal to escape the facility. Try to escape with your friends!

name: Fatal Run 2089
description: Atari’s Fatal Run 2089 delivers over-the-top driving action across a post-apocalyptic landscape. You’ll have to race against a countdown clock at incredibly high-speeds and destroy enemy vehicles by any means necessary. Fail to complete your missions and you put humanity in jeopardy.

name: Pikmin 2: Hole of Villains
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: Hole of Villains EX
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: Toxic Dinner
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: Yet Another Purple Cave
description: Sin descripción

name: Paranoia
description:
"The friendship of two girls is tossed around by cruel fate."

There were two girls. They were always together.
No matter the time of the day, no matter what happens.
They are always together, because they are friends.

This story begins when they become junior high students.

name: Pikmin 2: Bombastic Bulbmin
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: The Pikmin 2 Experience
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: Unconventional Bosses
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: IDK
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2: Snowy Tutorial
description: Sin descripción

name: A Secret Between You and Me
description:
"A Secret Between You and Me" is an adult visual novel game in the horror-adventure genre.
Become the protagonist and win the heart of the mysterious heroine.
This game is a sequel to the free PC game, "You, Me, and Empty Words."

name: Pikmin Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: Mihomi Dream
description:
“This is the venomous cry of a person defeated by life.”

A novel containing two stories, Mihomi and her brother's point of views.

A fandisc for Menherafflesia.

name: Lab
description: Explore and escape a mutant infested lab. Collect weapons, health and armor upgrades and fight and try to survive the onslaught!

name: A House in the Rift
description: A HOUSE IN THE RIFT is a sandbox harem game with monthly updates. It’s densely packed and easy to navigate.

name: Matsuri Messiah
description:
“Would you like to peek in my heart, which is darker than the abyss?”

Two short stories. A story of Matsuri's past, and a future where she lived.

A fandisc for Menherafflesia

name: Nenene Noble
description:
“If you fail to realize your happiness, you will step into despair. Like poison corroding a flower..."

Nenene's point of view, of her past and behind the scenes of Menherafflesia.

name: Strigoi
description:
"We, my sister and I, have long lived abroad, together with the longing for our homeland. Not long ago, we received an invitation to a party in Romania, in the Carpathians. My sister, without hesitation, got into the car and left. I refused to go, but after some time I received a terrifying message from my sister. Frightened, I dropped everything and quickly set out to find her. I wonder what happened?"

Strigoi is a first-person horror shooter set in the Carpathian Mountains. You will face various enemies (Vampires, Strigoi...), encounter interesting puzzles, and find different items that will help you overcome obstacles and enemies.

name: Haitoku Shirene: Anata no Shiranai Naraku no Soko
description:
You must not set foot in this story with a pure and loving heart.
When you pursue the forbidden secret of the girl, you will be struck down to the depths of hell...

name: Kubitori Sarasa
description:
Attack, or be attacked? A Japanese horror game where you spend a night together with a beautiful woman.

You're a man lost in the snowy mountains and a beautiful woman saves your life! The blizzard is so bad that you're going to spend the night in her hut together.

Will he attack her, or will she attack him?

name: Mojika: Truth Rears Its Ugly Head
description: Explore themes of bullying, revenge, blackmail, and abuse, interwoven with lies, truth, beauty, and ugliness. The story follows an ugly boy who reaches his breaking point due to constant torment and decides to use his power to read thoughts to seek revenge.

name: Yanderella Death Harem
description:
“The worst, worst, and most beloved story, told all over again...”

A story from Hinata and Honoka's point of views.

A fandisc for Yanderella.

name: Outbreak: Survival Kit Collection
description: Nine undead horrors await as you fight for survival across the Outbreak universe.

name: Jammer Dash
description: Jammer Dash is a free rhythm 2D game in which you move and destroy objects on beat made for Windows and Linux! Inspired by many awesome games such as Muse Dash, Geometry Dash and osu!. Made in Unity and C#.

name: Sacrifice Villains
description: Ever since the day the powers appeared, crime has ruled the streets of Scum City. As the conniving villains grow stronger and stronger, and the heroes find themselves walloped rather than walloping... it falls to you to rehabilitate S-rank villains in this short visual novel!

name: Asami Escape
description:
When I woke up, I was in a strange room.

The protagonist, Etarou, wakes up in a strange room with a suspicious woman watching him from the monitor. It seems she knows him, yet he can't seem to remember anything about himself nor his past. For some reason, he seems to have brought her anger upon himself and so must escape, avoiding her gaze.

name: Mikuri Sacrament
description:
“At the end of the world, a girl leaves behind her femininity and locks her heart in ice."

A story of Mikuri's past and her meeting with Megi and Angelica from her point of view.

A fandisc for The Cradle of Ruin.

name: NandGame
description: An educational puzzle game. Solve a series of tasks where you build increasingly powerful components.

name: Star Shoot VS
description: Star Shoot VS is a casual online shooting game.

name: Death's Apprentice
description: Death's Apprentice is a PC-Windows game. It's an Arcade Platformer with a linear progression through the stages.

name: Pumpkin Dash
description: A browser game where you have to collect candies with a pumpkin.

name: I Want To Cheat
description:
I don't want my girlfriend to break up with me.....
But I want to cheat on her......
Then, I just have to 'cheat' without getting caught!!

name: Tractor Beams
description: A puzzle browser game.

name: Kimi to Boku to Hitorigoto
description:
“Well then, here and now, let's talk about the truth that was never revealed.”

Empty words, secret words and finally, "my own words". Everything about the mysterious boy "Akino" is revealed here.

name: Fat Frumos
description: ZX Spectrum adventure game based on the Romanian folk hero Fat Frumos.

name: Overnight Tea
description:
“Evening tea carries the scent of death.”

A girl calling herself your girlfriend appears in front of you, who has no memory.
Although you're meant to have a good relationship with her, gradually her true nature is revealed...?! Uncover her true motives!!

name: The Nightscarred: Forgotten Gods
description: Embrace your destiny as the daughter of Erlik, the god of death, in this immersive first-person action game. Craft your own spells, creatively combine them with Nightscarred's hybrid combat system, and assassinate your foes to restore balance in a physics-driven shamanic world based on Turkic mythology. Play alone or team up with a friend in co-op mode.

name: Yanderain
description:
Poor communication skills, plain, dumb, poor, and gloomy is all that could be said to describe this story's protagonist, Amatarou, who is an unpopular student with nothing special going for him. He begins to have a secret relationship with Shigure Yadori, an honors student in his class.

When it rains, unbeknownst to anyone, the two of them have a secret rendezvous behind the school building. Forced to do vile crimes and hardcore sexual acts by Yadori, the worthless Amatarou begins to develop a superiority complex from having a secret relationship with her and becomes engulfed in her twisted relationship.

name: Yona Yona
description:
Nekura Yotarou is an employee of an old-fashioned love hotel "Hotel Yonaguni". One of his hobbies was peeking into the nightly affairs of his guests night after night.

One day while he was doing his usual peeking, he saw something he should not have seen. His destiny changes when he learns of a certain secret of the hotel...

name: Baki-baki Memoir
description:
A collaboration game with a famous YouTuber!

Control the main character, Gunpi, and conquer the three heroines!

name: Saikoro Saiko: Memento Mori
description:
“Death is salvation. I'm sure she would want it too.”

Behind the scenes of Saikoro Saiko, the story of Saiko.
The fearsome yandere who knows everything, and what happened to her.

name: Saikoro Saiko: Promises
description:
“Someday — Someday, until this happy dream gets shattered.”

Two short stories. A sequel to Saikoro Saiko that reveals what happens to Metarou and Saiko. And a prequel to Saikoro Saiko that shows us the story about a promise between two girls, Nana and Saiko.

name: Saikoro Saiko: Miss Fortune
description:
“This is something that can't be helped, you see. To be pitiful... is just so cute.”

Two stories regarding Saiko.
Lethal dose of Delusion: The story of Saiko's first love with Metarou, from her point of view. In order to monopolize his heart, I have to be in more pain. In order to be seen as pitiful, her self-harming ways escalate...
Danger Rhododendron: A story from Metarou's perspective of what happens to him and Saiko after the IF end. Just when you think happiness is yours...

name: Tsukame, Jinsei no Migiuchi! GoGo Zenkaiten Arashi wo Yobu! Honoo no Pachinkas Road
description:
The main character, Gintarou, is a salaryman working at a cell phones sale company. Ever since his senior taught him how to play Pachinko, he's been going to the Pachinko parlor to play. One day, he sees a customer who seems to have lost at Pachinko.

“ Uwaaaaaaaaaaaan—!!! Uwaaaaaaaaa—!!!”

The man's roar echoed sadly. I felt as if there were a melody... like a flower yearning for the spring breeze. People passing through simply laughed at the man and took pictures, eventually an employee came from inside the store and taps the man on the shoulder, signalling him to leave. It's surely an unacceptable reality for that man... I can understand how he feels. Because I, too, am a man on the loser's path. That man's present will become my future.

That is how the protagonist is living, before he meets “Reiyo Yuria” at the Pachinko parlor, changing his life completely...

name: Pokémon Kanto Origins
description: Explore a much darker Kanto, face new tougher challenges, and become the conqueror of the region.

name: Way of the Chook
description: A browser beat 'em up game.

name: Gozen 4-ji no Manimani: Nisemono World's End
description:
An ordinary writer creates, longing to be like God [Fenikkusu]. One night, at 4 AM, he meets a mysterious girl called "Feni" in a park. "Oji-san, would you like to know the truth... or would you remain happier if you were blissfully unaware?"

She entrusts the protagonist with a mysterious, golden bird's egg. If the protagonist can make someone happy, the phoenix can rise again. "What I am about to tell you is the end of the fake world, that was created by God."

The girl speaks to him, "This is a story of love, madness and the bizarre, the end of... "me"."
At 4 am, the Phoenix awaits its end. You and I, who have sinned, spend our last moments together.

name: Mikoto Memory
description:
A mid-length novel game containing two stories.
Pandora Diary — a story where Mikoto tells a “certain someone” about her sins, her loves and her vow, and “he” who atoned for those sins.
Happy Birthday • Happy End — Several years after Matarou turns himself in, leaving behind Mikoto and Mitarou. Several years later, on April 27th, Mikoto and Mitarou hold a birthday party for Mikoto's birthday. In the meanwhile, the police are informed of an escaped inmate in the neighborhood...

A fandisc of Mikoto Nikki.

name: Megi Amantes
description:
"...... Thank you for being born, my precious treasure."

This disc contains two short scenarios.

A Dream of a Mechanical Doll and a Fetus:
A story about Megi's past life and her life now. Her memories of becoming a doll, and the meaning of her birth as told by the girl in the blue flower field.

At the End of the Blue Star's Dream:
A sequel to the main story of Cradle of Ruin. After Hotarou leaves the shelter, those who he left behind are...

name: Hatsumonogatari
description:
Which of the four heroines will you choose?

Detarou is enrolling into a private school, the formerly girls-only "Lovely Academy", which has only become co-ed starting this year. Deepen your romance with the heroines via interacting with them after-school! Which of these heroines will become your first love?

name: Plant Mall
description: This game is a small maze explorer where you will plant flowers and meet new faces along the way.

name: Lost Paradise of Karuta
description:
"The one who came to meet me as I attempted suicide was a pure white grim reaper."

"A visual novel ensemble drama gift for those who find living in the present difficult."

A visual novel game themed around life and the human psyche, dedicated to those struggling to live in today's challenging times. This is a story searching for the answer to why we live.

name: Cannon Fighter
description: You are the last surviving member of an artillery regiment fighting in the desert. Using your cannon you are trying to destroy a wave of advancing tanks ans stop them reaching a supply dump. When the first wave is destroyed you are attacked by super thanks that are more difficult to hit. You have 4 defensive positions and if the thanks reach your last defensive position or you receive 3 direct hits the game ends.

name: Cannon Fighter
description: An unofficial browser port.

name: Colour Chain
description: A browser puzzle game.

name: Match Quest
description: A browser puzzle game.

name: Project Shaman
description: Project Shaman is a demo about Turkic Mythology. You play as Kam, a shaman that needs to reach Tamag (Hell) and fight Erlik, the god of the dead. In this demo you are stopped by one of Erlik's 3 daughters, Kiştey Ana. You must defeat Kiştey Ana to get deeper into Tamag.

name: StellwerkSim
description: StellwerkSim is a simulator game about german signalling. Its based of the german Sp DR S 60 signal system. Its singleplayer (training mode) or multiplayer.

name: Houmatsu Tunnel
description:
There's a tunnel that is rumored to allow you to meet a dead person if you pass through it at 2am.
After hearing this, Kyoka, decides to go to the tunnel with his boyfriend Yukio, but...

A short BL visual novel.

name: Shuyaku ni Narenai Boku-tachi ha Kadan de Kaeru wo Tsubusunda.
description:
Kimura Natsuya is average at everything he does, with a complex about his mediocrity.
Then, a celebrity called Tokiwa Akihiko, who was known as a one in a hundred million beautiful boy, appears before Natsuya...

-- Natsuya's emotions are shaken by Akihiko's presence...

name: Sayo-kun no Omajinai
description:
When he was in elementary school, Suzue Masato met Tsutsui Sayo, who was in the next class, at a psychiatric clinic.
Sayo asks Masato to be his friend.
They promise to stay friends forever, and so the two become best friends.
However, after becoming a junior high school student, Sayo becomes addicted to online streaming and starts to get estranged from Masato.
Feeling betrayed, Masato started hating Sayo and posting hateful comments on anonymous message boards, but...

A short BL visual novel.

name: Inkya Danshi de Asobou!
description:
Chifuyu, the main character, has a cute face but his personality is the worst sexual pervert.
Chifuyu also bullies and humiliates his "toy" Natsuna today!!!

name: Saitama Zombie Parade
description:
In 2121, there was a zombie outbreak in Saitama.
Saitama had turned to pandemonium.

Run. Run. Run.
I wonder how long I've been running for now.
I can't stop. If I do, I'm dead meat.
I mean, I'm in the very middle of a zombie apocalypse!
No matter where I go, there's zombies walking around.
I can't seem to find a single human that hadn't yet been transformed.
I would imagine people all around the world have already turned,
but then again, it feels like the virus is only still running rampant here.

"Ooh... A-aagh..."

A zombie suddenly walked out from behind a utility pole.
"This is it", I thought, closing my eyes reflexively.

I was ready to get bitten, but I didn't feel any pain.
Instead, I heard a sharp buzz and the sound of meat being cleaved.
Then, the zombie let out an agonized moan.
When I opened my eyes, I saw...

My friend Makina, wielding a chainsaw.

name: LEGO Agents: Mission X
description:
Lego Agents: Mission X was a web browser game based on the Ultra Agents set from 2008.
The player was tasked to complete various missions based on different sets using different vehicles.

name: 10-Second Ghost
description: A creative indie game from GameJam. Your past self will turn into a ghost and help your current self solve the puzzle together.

name: What Happened: Through Worlds
description: Delve into a digital odyssey of discovery and unravel the mystery!

name: Animal Water Pang!
description: Combine cute animal plushies to earn points and create larger plushies! Try not to let the plushies spill out of the claw machine on your quest for a high score.

name: Island Survival: Craft, Build, Grow
description: From Shipwreck to Escape: Master Survival.

name: Eggconsole Xanadu Scenario II PC-8801mkIISR
description: Sin descripción

name: Dice Make 10!
description:
New type puzzle uses dice and make 10.
Two modes of puzzles, “Inserting Puzzle” and “Falling Block Puzzle”, are available

name: Powered Platformer Bundle
description: ~ Bob the Elementalist + NeonPowerUp! + TP Bullet ~

name: Pawfect Cat Mansion
description: Create a feline paradise and turn an old mansion into a house full of adorable cats! Everyone loves cute little kittens!

name: Supermarket Manager Simulator
description: Manage your own shop! Chips, chips, meat, burgers, vegetables and fruit. Eggs, cheese, breakfast cereals, juices or milk - order all your products cheaply online and put them on the shelves.

name: Lost in Heart of Chernobyl: Survival
description: Survive the Shadows, Uncover the Truth.

name: Grand Prix Formula One
description: Live the intense experience of Formula One Racing !

name: QwikWits
description: Fun and fast-paced party game. Challenge your friends and family or go on a solo Winning Run. Stay sharp and you could be crowned Qwikest Wit!

name: Eggconsole Star Trader PC-8801mkIISR
description: Sin descripción

name: As Per My Last Email
description: Unleash your office rage—one swing at a time!

name: Arcade Archives: The Ninja Kids
description:
"THE NINJA KIDS" is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Our ninja-doll heroes must battle to save their town from the evildoers who are plotting to resurrect a great evil.
Take control of one of 4 characters, who might look similar, but are as individual as they are colourful, and slice and dice your enemies with justice in your heart, and ninja magic at your fingertips!

name: White Eternal
description: There's something hiding in the cold of winter. What made your friend disappear? Snow's begun to fall. Let's just wait a little bit longer.

name: Hentai Girls: Paris Romance
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Jeju Island-1
description: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: Chicken Party: Animal Farm
description: Enjoy this charming graphic novel set on a magical and lively farm.The story follows the exciting adventures of Clara, a curious and intelligent hen, and her brave friends.

name: Cooking
description: Run the best restaurant in the middle of the city, complete orders, learn new recipes, and improve your cooking skills.

name: Banana Tap
description: fun and addictive game, your goal is to tap on various unique and advanced types of bananas

name: Tiles Match
description: Simple puzzle fun, match three tiles to clear the row!

name: Arcade Archives: Knuckle Heads
description: Serious competition is here.

name: Model Style: Dress Up!
description: Design fabulous looks with dresses, hairstyles and accessories. Capture your creations, customise your models and dazzle at fashion shows!

name: Animal Zoo: The Forgotten Land
description: Dive into this exciting visual novel. Join Luna, the wise owl, and Max, the brave tiger, along with their friends: Roco the mouse, Pepe the penguin, and Nina the giraffe.

name: Anime Girls: Lady Liberty
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: The Little Mermaid: Wonder Puzzles
description: With over 100 images and three game modes, it's perfect for kids and juniors. Have fun solving all the puzzles. Ideal for little explorers!

name: Ice World: The Frozen Age
description: In this visual novel, a group of prehistoric creatures embark on an epic journey to find the legendary Warm Valley.

name: Hentai Stars: Superb Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Crystal Project: Mod Pack 2 - New Challenges
description: Sin descripción

name: Dredge Expansion Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Medieval Fantasy: Jigsaw Puzzle - Eerie Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Sherlock Purr 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: NPool: Snooker Mode
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien Hominid
description: Sin descripción

name: The Demons Down Under
description: Play as a bunny and slay demons deeper and deeper into the depths of hell. Collect loot, upgrade weapons, slay demons, and rescue all the sisters in this action RPG shooter.

name: Alien Hominid 360
description: Sin descripción

name: Ignition Arena
description: Ignition Arena is a competitive space combat game where players build and customize their own starships to engage in intense PvP battles. Set in a futuristic arena, the game emphasizes strategic shipbuilding and fast-paced combat. Players can choose from a wide array of ship components, including weapons, armor, and equipment, to create their ideal battle-ready vessel. With a focus on skill-based gameplay, Ignition Arena offers a dynamic multiplayer experience where tactics and customization are key to victory.

name: Awful Mario World
description: Sin descripción

name: DeLight: The Journey Home - Chapter 4
description:
DeLight: The Journey Home - Chapter 4 is the fourth part of the five-part story.

Chapter 4, after leaving the shelter, Sammy and Deli finds themselves struggle to make the journey possible. They come to a post office who desperately in need of help making some deliveries. Sammy agrees to help in return for a car ride but what lies ahead may not be that simple...…

name: DsDooM3
description: DsDoom 3 is a 32-level total conversion for Doom II created by Sniper 109 for Boom-compatible ports. DsDoom 3 was created to maintain compatibility with the DS Doom port, which was created to play Doom on Nintendo DS handheld consoles and is based on PrBoom. As the name of the WAD and the title screen indicate, the mod is heavily based off Doom 3, with its weapons and most of its enemies being closely modeled after that game, featuring new and unique behaviors through DeHackEd.

name: Chrono Ark: High Roller
description:
Casino-themed DLC for Chrono Ark, featuring a new, optional boss with its own substory, new equipment and relics, as well as casino-themed skins for Lucy and 6 investigators, with accompanying VFX.

The investigators obtaining a new skin are Helia & Selena, Miss Chain, Momori, Narhan, and Silverstein.

name: Sonic Souls
description: Sonic Souls is a Fan made creation, its been made with Unreal Development Kit (UDK).

name: Sonic The Hedgehog 2D
description: A 2D remake of Sonic '06 which features a complete remake of all Sonic stages and bosses.

name: Uraankhians Dygyn: The Beginning
description: URAANHAI! Finally, we have all together driven Alaa-Mogus into the underworld! Now let's have a real Ysyakh and celebrate! Let's organize the first "DYGYNA" game and find out who is the fastest! Play in multiplayer and become the FIRST!

name: I Remember This Dream
description: "I Remember This Dream" is a first-person survival horror game which takes place in a cold winter forest where there is only you and your fear hiding in the shadows of the trees.

name: No Blood, No Fowl
description: Sin descripción

name: Orbo's Exodus
description:
After a whirlwind odyssey with his friend, our accountant-turned-hero Orbo decides to make his way home by way of Peeb's signature biplane. While flying over the coast of a mysterious vacation resort, Peeb's attempt to demonstrate a cool loop-de-loop turns into a spectacular nosedive that is only one-upped by the resulting explosion.

Following the crash, Orbo is left stranded, with Peeb nowhere in sight. Left to his own devices, Orbo begins an all-new quest to buy a ferry back to the mainland, but in the process he may discover there's more to the island than meets the eye...

Armed with some new moves and a set of snazzy hats, Orbo sets out on his final adventure: an exodus of epic proportions.

name: Disney's The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea
description: Disney's The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea is a PC CD-Rom game based on the movie of the same name. The game has the player follow Ariel as she introduces us to her daughter, Melody, as they both go on magical adventures throughout the underwater world of Atlantica.

name: Apex Legends: Shockwave
description: Grab the squad, because the Games have a whole new energy! Drop back into the fight with Revivals, feel your power surge with Akimbo, use two new Battle Sense features to narrow in on your enemies in the heat of the fight, and more updates that make the Outlands legendary for all. Hone your skills in Bot Royale and hit new heights in E-District, your very own neon playground. Customize Stat Trackers to suit your needs or your ships, and you’ll automatically unlock three new ones for logging in this season. Time to Tap in, Legend.

name: Unicycle Pizza Time!
description: Unicycle Pizza Time! is a rage inducing platformer where you navigate a dense cityscape without falling over.

name: Hydrate
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball Mania Plus
description:
A remake of Pinball Mania which updates the 2D original tables into 3D.

The tables are:
- Daredevil
- Kick-off
- Jackpot
- Jailbreak
- Tarantula
- The Visitors

name: Roswell Pinball
description: An alien themed Pinball table.

name: The Avengers Pinball
description: Pinball table based on the TV show by the same name.

name: Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana 2 After Episode
description: Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana 2 After Episode is an Atelier side game taking place after the ending of Atelier Iris 2: The Azoth of Destiny.

name: Light-Years Away
description: Light Years Away is an epic sci-fi ARPG survival game that plunges you into the vast, uncharted depths of space. As a stranded starship captain, you must navigate through mysterious galaxies, gather resources, and recruit a unique crew to help you on your journey home. The game combines elements of top-down shooter action, resource management, and exploration, creating a rich and immersive experience.

name: Solace Creek
description: Solace Creek is a Horror game with a focus on suspense, exploration, stealth & puzzle solving. You wake up in a sinister place, haunted by a monstrous presence. Uncover the mystery of this dark place... or become its prey.

name: Surfpunk
description: Become a wave-shredding Raider in this intense, PvE co-op extraction ARPG. Hop on your Rushboard, loot ancient artifacts, hack n’ slash through hordes of monsters and escape in style. Surf, Shred, Scavenge, Repeat!

name: Electric Fairyland
description: Join Stix the fairy on an a tiny 3D adventure through the dense undergrowth of a fantasy garden. A bite-sized collectathon inspired by 90s platformers and childrens' picture books.

name: Underground
description:
Utsumi Natsumu, whose father is a professional baseball player, has absolute confidence and pride in his baseball ability.
But when in high school he meets Fuyuki Nagito, a true genius, Natsumu's life goes awry.

A dark coming-of-age BL story woven by two people who should never have met.

name: Funny Rain
description:
Ichihashi Sanae lost his wife and daughter in an accident one year ago. After their deaths, Sanae loses his will to live, is diagnosed with depression, and begins to have suicidal thoughts.

He is no longer able to work or even do simple household chores, but there is someone who takes care of him.

It is Sakamaki Yura, the younger brother of his wife Yumi.

name: RGG Checkers
description: A multiplayer checkers game for up to eight players, two on each team. The moves are not made step-by-step, but are made through the passing of video games. The winner is the one who has taken all the checkers of all opponents.

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo
description: Sin descripción

name: Coffee Talk: Tokyo
description: Coffee Talk: Tokyo is the newest instalment of the beloved coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator. It brings the warmth, heart, and delicious drinks from the previous games to an all-new café in Tokyo where humans and yokai alike share their stories.

name: Sea of Stars: Throes of the Watchmaker
description: This Sea of Stars DLC finds the Solstice Warriors Valere and Zale venturing into the miniature clockwork world of Horloge. In this magical land where denizens are threatened by a cursed carnival, our heroes will need to adapt to unfamiliar rules if their Sun and Moon powers are to manifest.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Shrek Special Pack
description:
Playtime is ogre. Get to work cleaning up five fairy tale maps inspired by DreamWorks Animation’s Shrek. It’ll take more than pixie dust to restore these iconic locales to their former lustre, but thankfully, happily ever after is in your hands!

Like onions, dirt has layers. And boy, this particular brew of filth is potent enough to rival even the Fairy Godmother’s strongest concoctions. A sprinkle of soap, a touch of elbow grease and a large dose of ‘DING’s make for the perfect antidote potion! Wash it all down with a swish of high-pressure water and you’ll have these enchanting locations looking as spotless as the Magic Mirror.

name: Morsels
description: Morsels is a fast-paced creature collecting roguelite with a rotating roster of characters to switch between at will. Overcome a clique of killer cats as you fight your way out of the sewers in this unique, action-packed journey.

name: Tret
description: A hybrid puzzler set in a synthwave world. Complex platforming meets physics-based synthball manipulation, with a dash of high-speed races across a neon-soaked landscape, all set to the tune of a killer electronic soundtrack paying homage to the colorful eighties.

name: Pico Park 2
description: PICO PARK is back with all new levels! Play with 2-8 players locally or online in this co-op action-puzzle game!

name: Tetris Forever
description:
Tetris Forever celebrates the original, genre-inspiring puzzle game that escaped from behind the Iron Curtain, onto the world stage, and into our cultural consciousness.

More than 15 playable classic games from the series' history are featured, including many being released for the first time outside Japan. Battle your friends in the multiplayer cult favorite Tetris Battle Gaiden, create massive explosions to clear lines in Super Bombliss, and see where it all began in 1984 with an accurate recreation of the first version of Tetris on the Electronika 60 computer.

name: Star Overdrive
description: Use your powers to explore a massive world on your Hoverboard at lightning speed, face multitudes of enemies and epic bosses. Journey through four uniquely distinct biomes, each brimming with challenges and secrets to uncover.

name: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter
description: A remake of the first installment in the main Trails series, serving as the beginning to the Liberl arc and the series as a whole. The game follows protagonists Estelle Bright and her adopted brother Joshua, who journey through the country of Liberl to train to become senior Bracers, members of a non-government multinational organization that acts to keep the peace and protect civilians.

name: Star Wars: Hunters - Season 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Worms Armageddon: Anniversary Edition
description: Worms Armageddon: Anniversary Edition is a modern release of the 1999 classic, including cross-generation console online play for up to 6 players.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Patrick Star Game
description: Patrick fans, your time has come – and Bikini Bottom is your open-world playground! You can skydive with just a parasol (or nothing at all), search for buried treasure in the Dump, or release the rage in Mrs. Puff’s Rage Room. Use almost any item you find, - from the reef blower to a paint can, - to make the world more Patrick. And take on challenges only Patrick would attempt, set by up SpongeBob, Sandy Cheeks, Mr. Krabs, and more. So become the Star of the show, put your silliest ideas into action, and enjoy the physics-based chaos that unfolds all around you!

name: My Time at Evershine
description: Sin descripción

name: Fitness Boxing 3: Your Personal Trainer
description: Start your fitness journey with Fitness Boxing 3: Your Personal Trainer for Nintendo Switch!

name: Capcom Fighting Collection 2
description:
Capcom's newest fighting collection hits the stage!

Choose from fan-favorite games like Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001 and Project Justice to 3D action games like Power Stone and Power Stone 2 in this collection of eight classic fighting games!

Each game in the collection can be played online or co-op!

Get back in the ring and duke it out in battles that everyone rumored, but no one believed!
Whether it's with a rival new or old, give it your all and strive for victory!

name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land
description:
In a world where alchemy is deemed "taboo", the alchemist Yumia yearns for the "truth" that lies hidden in the ruined continent.
Now, she takes her first steps on a grand adventure across the continent─

name: Castlevania Dominus Collection
description: Three incredible action adventure games from the Castlevania series have finally returned, for the first time! But wait, there's more! Haunted Castle Revisited, a redesigned version of the very first Castlevania arcade game, makes its debut!

name: Tales of Graces F Remastered
description: Tales of Graces f Remastered is an action RPG with high-speed battles that allow you to switch between fighting styles to match your play style. The remastered title adds more than 80 DLC packs and items release for the original and features stunning visuals, newly localized scenes available in English for the first time, and notable quality of life enhancements such as auto-save.

name: MySims: Cozy Bundle
description:
Make adorable friends and discover creative adventures across retro re-releases of two lovable games in MySims: Cozy Bundle. Use your imagination to rebuild a town in MySims and help a cute magical land become an even better place in MySims Kingdom.

There are stories to uncover, locations to explore, and lots of characters with big personalities to meet.

name: Quidget the Wonderwiener
description: Quidget the Wonderwiener is a spin-off of peninja

name: Disney Music Parade Encore
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Ceana the Wraithress
description: Sin descripción

name: Animal Tower Battle
description: A fun and easy battle game for all ages, with simple rules and controls, playable online and offline!

description: Sin descripción

name: Doraemon Dorayaki Shop Story
description:
A game where you run a sweets shop with the popular manga character Doraemon. Let's make Doraemon's favorite dorayaki and create a store that will be the talk of the town.

First, make the sweets, set up the shelves, prepare the tables, and get ready to run the shop. In addition, various characters from Fujiko・F・Fujio's works will appear as customers.

name: Beyblade X Xone
description: 'BEYBLADE X XONE is a "Beyblade action" game that faithfully recreates the BEYBLADE X series (distributed by TOMY Company, Ltd.) that is popular among fans of all ages. Battle through intense Beybattles and aim for the top of The X!

name: Unless
description: Take a trip back to the nostalgic era of platforming games built without gimmicks or a story. Race through bite-sized levels solo, or with a co-op helper to get the best time among your friends, or maybe even the world!

name: Exits
description: A Japanese collection of escape room puzzles for mobile

name: The Official Everton FC Intelligensia
description:
The Official Everton F.C. Intelligensia is a quiz game about football. Despite the title it's not specifically about Everton as the player can choose to represent any English top flight team of the 1989/90 season and it features question about both domestic and international football. All questions have three alternatives to choose from and has to be done before time runs out. Some are accompanied with a picture.

The game is built around the FA Cup and like in real life first division clubs enters the competition in the third round. In each round the player has to answer a number of questions which depends on the opposition drawn and if it's a home or away game. Opposition from higher divisions lead to more questions being asked. Goals are scored by answering questions correctly and the number of answers required depend on the difficulty level chosen. In the same way goals are conceded by answering questions wrongly.

name: Birdwatcher
description: Birdwatcher is a short visual novel created for O2A2 2024 with strict asset limitations.

name: Wrecked Shot
description: You have liked embarking all your life. But even so, you don't know how to orient yourself at night, so one day you build up your courage and try. The family boat you inherited, however, is a bit too long, which together with bad weather end up wrecking you in an archipelago.

name: Harvest Moon: Home Sweet Home
description:
Head back to your roots and leave the city life for your childhood village of Alba in Harvest Moon: Home Sweet Home, where the freshest fish and tastiest veggies are grown and caught by the local farmers and anglers!

However, with its population getting older and younger villagers leaving for the big city, Alba Village has seen better days, so can you help turn it from a village on the decline to one of prosperity? With its beautiful surroundings, Alba definitely has the potential, so work hard to bring tourists and even new residents to this sprawling green village! Reunite with your childhood friend and other familiar faces to help put Alba on the map!

name: Destiny 2: Echoes - Act 3
description: Confront the Conductor. Solve the mystery and put an end to the twisted machinations fighting for control of the Echoes.

name: Individualism In The Dead Internet Age: An Anti Big Tech Asset Flip
description:
This is an interactive-essay-meets-walking-sim about technocapitalism and the things we lost along the way.
Follow coins under the electric mist of a clouded starry sky. Discover hyper-links. Listen to the words both inside and outside your head. Seal your fate before the productivity machine. Together we can defeat the machine.

name: Resident Fear 2
description: Take part in heart-stopping first-person action with waves of ravenous zombies. Use your weapons wisely, keep your ammo count at bay, and stay focused—all decisions are literally matters of life and death.

name: Haunted Castle Revisited
description:
Haunted Castle Revisited, a redesigned version of the very first Castlevania arcade game, makes its debut!

The game was released within the Castlevania Dominus Collection.

name: Byte Breakers
description: Byte Breakers is a platform fighting battle royale for 40 players. Navigate a massive city, gear up, and escape the encroaching glitch zone while battling the world to become the last duo standing.

name: PelPet
description: PelPet climbs down a ladder. Players can add or remove the crossbars to change PelPet's direction. As PelPet goes down and down, he becomes faster and faster; collect items to help manage your journey and avoid obstacles.

name: Spikeball
description: Spikeball is a sports video game that adapts the classic game of Spikeball to the digital environment. Designed to offer a fast and competitive gaming experience, it allows you to face players from all over the world or enjoy games with friends.

name: Star Wars: Clone Wars: Planetary Forces
description: Star Wars: Clone Wars: Planetary Forces was a Flash-based arcade online game based on Cartoon Network's 2003 Star Wars: Clone Wars animated series. It was launched in October 2003 as part of Cartoon Network's Clone Wars website. It became unavailable when Cartoon Network took the website offline.

description: The game is played by synthesising various holomen to score points. There are currently 14 different modes, including past events.

name: Chronon
description: The purpose of Chronon is to let the little yellow dwarf out of a center cage. The master of this house will come back at 7pm; you make the way to escape with moving and interacting with items in the house at each fixed hour until the master comes back.

name: 512 Linedefs of /vr/
description: 512 Linedefs of /vr/ is a 32-map community megawad for Doom II designed for Boom-compatible source ports by various members of 4chan's retro videogames board, led by MacGuffin and released on the Doomworld forums on June 28, 2022. It is a restriction-based project inspired by similar /vr/ projects (such as 200 Minutes of /vr/ and 2048 Units of /vr/). Mappers were limited to creating maps with no more than 512 linedefs.

name: Kirby Fighters 2 Memory Match-Up
description: Kirby Fighters 2 Memory Match-Up is a memory game for the Play Nintendo website. In the game the player flips over cards and has to match copy abilities with each other.

name: World Club Champion Football: Intercontinental Clubs 2011-2012
description: World Club Champion Football: Intercontinental Clubs 2011-2012 is a soccer arcade game developed by Panini and Sega R&D1 in 2012.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles of Rage
description: A perfect mashup of two of the most famous beat ‘em up game franchises - Streets of Rage and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

name: An Aunt After My Own Heart
description: Discovering his beautiful young aunt is engaged to be married, a nephew takes matters into his own hands.

name: Chaos Caster
description: Cast spells, dash around hordes of enemies, and assemble powerful combos as you explore procedurally generated dungeons. Chaos Caster is an action roguelike focused on strategy, playstyle variety, and replayability.

name: Real Hentai Situation! DT
description: This newest entry in the Real Hentai Situation series brings all of the sex appeal and laughs you've come to expect, and more!

name: Real Anime Situation! DT
description: I’m Shun, and I have a talent for crushing romance flags—in real life! Featuring even more eye-popping art, nuanced animations, plus a fresh-faced cast of DT-obsessed heroines, this censored release of the Moe Game Awards-winning comedy franchise also received its own hit anime adaptation.

In this collectible RPG, put together a composition of unique heroes and use Hoyeon's unique switching feature to play in both turn-based mode and field battle mode.

description: Zero Zero: Perfect Stop is a train driving game for Playdate where you use the crank to control the train's throttle and brakes. Stop in the right place, at the right time. Maintain your timetable as you glide through scenic Yamanashi.

name: Fantasy Friends: Dream Worlds
description: Come and play with Aurea in Fantasy Friends: Dream Worlds, an ultra-cute puzzle and platform game. Enter this wonderful place and make lots of fantastic friends!

name: Croc: Legend of the Gobbos
description:
Argonaut Games, the legendary studio known for bringing its pioneering 3D technology to a 2D gaming world in the 1980s, has returned after a 20 year hiatus. It became a household name to gamers worldwide by developing groundbreaking titles, including the classics Starglider and Starglider 2, the seminal Star Fox (in collaboration with Nintendo), and Croc Legend of the Gobbos.

The reborn Argonaut Games continues the legacy established by Jez San OBE in 1982, now as a boutique publisher driven by creativity and developer collaboration. Possessing a catalog of classic gaming IP combined with a roadmap of original games, we hope you will join us as we embark on this exciting new chapter in Argonaut’s history.

Additionally, retro-gaming fans will be excited to know that the remaster includes the Crocipedia, an extensive and meticulously curated digital museum containing long-lost development assets, such as game design documents, concept art, animation tests, team member interviews, and much more.

name: Secret Of World
description: Secret of World is an MMORPG that immerses players in a vast, dynamic world where they can choose from four distinct characters, each endowed with unique and special abilities. The game features a balanced gameplay style with a focus on Player vs. Monster (PvM) content, making up 70% of the experience, while Player vs. Player (PvP) battles account for the remaining 30%. Players can align themselves with one of the three powerful empires, each offering its own challenges and rewards. In Secret of World, strategy, skill, and alliances are key as you navigate a world filled with danger, adventure, and intense competition.

The leads all point to a childhood tragedy and a certain deep-space Majin, so why him? And will Kanoko leave the dark side to save Seiji—and mankind—from herself?

name: Primal Hearts
description: After moving into a new town hoping for a new life, Kazuma finds himself the swing vote between two deadlocked factions representing tradition and innovation. Nicknamed “Triple Seven,” can he still live easy and find romance under his new status as a much-contested lucky guy?

name: Pairs & Perils
description: Pairs & Perils is a memory-game roguelike and dungeon crawler. Match cards to attack enemies, avoid traps, shop for relics and consumables. Sharpen your mind as you journey through the depths of the dungeon in search of The Dealer.

description: Travel to Canada sets off for another exciting journey with Hudsons. Enjoy the sights of Canada, from beautiful nature to astonishing big cities!

name: Liminal Border Part III
description: Following the events of Part II, Itsuki and the gang's "Rave" business is close to getting off the ground. Itsuki looks to Meryl Hathaway, a young girl often seen accompanying Kotoko, as a counter to the violence of the Umon-kai as he searches for a way to destroy them once and for all.

name: The Alchemist & His Battle-Scarred Homunculus
description:
A heartwarming tale of two broken people finding a new life together!

This heartwarming and dramatic tale follows Rakels, the young alchemist who helped create living homunculi to better the lives of mankind, only to have his partner betray him and turn their creations into tools of war. After years of exile for speaking out against their use as weapons during the war, Rakels discovers the battered form of Mel, a homunculus who was discarded by a slave trader.

As the two begin to confront their traumatic pasts together, a new bond is formed that helps them heal and forge a loving future together. Sweet and tender moments abound as Rakels and Mel face their fears of society and intimacy to truly come together as a couple.

name: Touhou Emblem
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou Emblem 2
description: Touhou Emblem 2 will focus around Reimu and Marisa being dragged into another set of incidents that are happening in Gensokyo. However, a sinister hand lurks around the corner, threatening to set Gensokyo into chaos, with a set of very old (and perhaps unfamiliar to new fans) faces lurking in the shadows.

name: Breakers
description: It is a turn-based hip-hop-breaking dance game where two players compete in intense dance battles. With 60 seconds to perform moves and earn points, QUARC blends the energy of breaking dance with strategy, offering a unique and engaging experience.

name: Cornucopias
description: Cornucopias is a multiplayer open-world game set in an alternate universe where humanity thrives above an earth in ruin. This new world in the sky is anchored by a new technology powered by the element Genesium, which ironically is what caused a planet-wide calamity. Join forces to explore, survive, combat quantum enemies, develop your territory, and compete for vital resources. In this vast new world, the choices are yours, and the path to success is yours to carve. You are no longer bound to earth - welcome to your future in the sky.

name: Forest of Perdition 2: The School Trip
description: James Everhart and his classmates embark on a school trip to the abandoned Tranquil Hills, a forest park shrouded in mysteries and horrors. As they explore the area, they uncover dark secrets and confront malevolent forces that threaten their lives and the truth of the past.

name: MySims: Cozy Bundle
description: Two adorable adventures!

name: Color Fan
description: An anime themed color by number coloring app.

name: Shadows of the Werewolf
description: Shadows of the Werewolf is a cinematic, third-person action-adventure game that places players in a suspenseful, horror-filled world. The story unfolds across various locations, including a suburban home and a mysterious forest retreat, where an innocent couple faces a relentless werewolf and other monstrous creatures. Players will engage in tense exploration, object interaction, and combat, using stealth and strategy to hide, fight, and escape from supernatural threats. The game blends elements of classic horror films and survival horror games, offering a narrative-driven, single-player experience filled with fear, suspense, and the challenge of survival under the full moon.

name: Magical Chaser: Stardust of Dreams
description: Magical Chaser ~Stardust of Dreams~ is a Japanese dōjin 2D fighting game for Windows, developed by the dōjin circle Dakken for the Fighter Maker 2nd engine and released in 2008. The game is a crossover of five magical girl Anime series: Ojamajo Doremi, Princess Comet, Fushigi Mahō Fan Fan Pharmacy, Fushigiboshi no Futagohime and Kasumin.

name: Grauen no Torikago: Kapitel 6 - Senritsu
description: Grauen no Torikago: Kapitel 6 - Senritsu is the sixth and final chapter of a horror movie sold exclusively through the Dreamcast Direct online service.

name: Love Heaven
description: Love Heaven was a puzzle rpg otome mobile game. Players could collect characters based on various historical people.

name: Geo-Political Simulator 5
description: The new evolution of Geopolitical Simulator series, the hyperrealistic simulator of today's world! em geopolitical simulator 5 , play as the Head of State ou CEO de uma compania and extend your influence around the globe. By playing as several countries, try to change the destiny of our planet with orchestrated actions.

name: Transformers G1 Awakening
description: Transformers G1: Awakening is a turn-based tactics mobile game in the Transformers franchise based on the 2007 Movie of the same name, developed and published by Glu Mobile. It was originally released for feature phones on November 12, 2008, before being ported to IOS in 2010. The game has been removed from the Apple App Store due to license reasons.

name: Buck and the Coin of Destiny
description:
Join Buck the Bunny in his quest to find the mysterious and magical Coin of Destiny in this side-scrolling adventure!

Collect coins and double jump your way through randomly-generated levels - from perilous forests and lava caverns to ancient castles and a fleet of pirate ships - to find the Coin's resting place. Choose your difficulty in Story Mode, featuring animated cut-scenes and in-game achievements. When you're done with Story Mode, play each level separately in Arcade Mode, where you can rack up the highest score possible in a never-ending gauntlet of peril.

On your journey, you'll encounter coin bonuses, health boosts, and invincibility power-ups that let you smash through your enemies, transforming Buck into a knight, pirate, gunslinger and more!

name: Jurassic World VRSE
description: Return to Isla Nublar for an intense VR gaming adventure. Fend off hungry Velociraptors in the jungle or hold off a pursuing T-Rex as you speed towards the Visitor Center. Creative thinking and problem solving is more than necessary to solve all levels. But do not worry! If you get stuck, you can always use the golden crown to skip a level.

Enjoy the new levels with new graphics and try to finish them all successfully without losing your crowns.

Yuri Spraytyvich has been selected for the role of Junior Strategic Missile Force Manager of Čerëmuški Command Post in Chita, Siberia.
His new position comes with a lot of responsabilities and he will need to deal with lack of maintenance, worker strikes, radioactive materials and PERIMETER, the soviet automatic defence system.
When PERIMETER receives by mistake the order to start the launch of the ballistic missile, it is up to Yuri to fix the problem and save the world from nuclear apocalypse.
D3AD HAND is a satirical Point and click comedy adventure game set during the cold war in a soviet bunker.

name: Merge Studio: Fashion Makeover
description:
Merge Studio: Fashion Makeover is your haven for embracing the art of makeup mastery and fashion brilliance! Explore a vast range of cosmetics, from mascara wonders to skincare marvels, creating awe-inspiring looks that leave clients breathless. Experiment with an array of clothing styles and accessories, from elegant jewelry to haute handbags, crafting ensembles fit for every fashionista's dream.

Embark on an exciting story mode, collaborating with diverse models and clients, each with distinctive tastes and trends. Customize looks and makeup, staying ahead with the latest fashion trends while unwinding in the ASMR mode, merging relaxation with fashion supremacy.

Revel in a world of makeup, merge mechanics, addictive tasks, and limitless fashion creativity, all encapsulated within Merge Studio: Fashion Makeover. From themed events to special gatherings, showcase your expertise by crafting supermodel-level looks at exclusive occasions.

Step into Merge Studio's realm, mastering fashion, makeup, and delivering utmost satisfaction, crafting your star status in the cosmos of fashion and makeover brilliance!

name: Climb Quest
description: Climb Quest is a challenging vertical platformer where you navigate through a fragmented world of floating islands, overcoming devious traps and solving intricate puzzles. Your goal is to ascend to the top, close the source of destruction alone or with your friends.

name: Rapta
description: Navigate through Silicon Sneak, where time is of the essence to save your sister. Choose to be an Ethical Hacker or one among those who hide from the police. With various minigames to challenge your dexterity, evolve with upgrades and make decisions to discover multiple endings.

name: Candle Wood
description: A brutal and gorgeous hand-drawn 2D platformer in a world of candle folks!

name: Against the Storm: Keepers of the Stone
description: As the struggle for survival against the Blightstorm continues, Against the Storm - Keepers of the Stone introduces a new species, a new biome, and a selection of new buildings, orders, risks, and opportunities for any Viceroy up for the challenge. The Frogs join the effort to push back the storm, bringing their skill with stone masonry and love for water with them. Meanwhile, a changing of the tides has unlocked new potential in the distance – the Coastal Groves have finally become accessible after countless cycles spent under the deluge. Though they remain isolated and hard to reach, the ancient, submerged settlements of the area hold great treasures waiting to be uncovered.

name: Minecraft: Stampy's Lovely World
description:
The official map of Stampy’s Lovely World. A place that was built over ten years and has been seen by millions.
Explore the town, play in the funland and experience the places where countless stories have been told.

• Includes 100+ attractions in Stampy’s Funland!
• Visit the town and discover its many shops and activities!
• Explore locations where memories were made!

Beyond the Skies of Arabia - Theme World includes the following glittering wonder content:
• 230+ Scenery Objects

The trials are partially staged, with your team ready to assist, but stay alert—unexpected threats may arise. Successfully report anomalies multiple times to earn your Field Agent badge.

name: Kyoryu
description: Ever wanted to run around a post-apocalyptic Japan where you, playing as a genetically re-engineered dinosaur, are the apocalypse that eliminated humanity and is now the dominant species? Heck yeah you have! Kyoryu is a third-person action-adventure where you get to do just that, picking through the literal bones of humanity while battling rival dino factions.

description: You have been transported to a procedurally generated voxel world where every decision matters. Manage resources, fight zombies and prepare for the harsh winters. Survive, build and thrive in an environment full of challenges and discoveries.

name: Pillaged Village: Ravaged by Savages
description: Uh-oh, those marauding barbarians are back, banging on the village gates! It’s high time you bore arms and showed those savages who’s boss... After all, not one but TWO childhood sweethearts are counting on you to save the day—godspeed, soldier!

name: Surface Level
description: Surface Level is a narrative turn-based RPG about bugs and letting others in. You play as a small rock named Hayes on a journey of self-discovery, making friends with bugs and overcoming hardships along the way.

name: Labyrinth Flowers
description: Etched in your memory, only a riddle remains. You, a budding adventurer, arrive in town to conquer this dungeon. The local adventurers’ guild wastes no time in evaluating your skills, then offers you a tantalizing proposal...!

name: Flaggle
description: A daily guessing game where players aim to guess the flag of a mystery country. Every guess reveals whether the target flag shares the colors on the guessed flag, in the same position as the guessed flag. Players can share results with friends, as well as play an unlimited mode.

name: The Mixologist
description:
The Mixologist brings the art of cocktail crafting to life in an immersive virtual reality experience. Whether you’re a seasoned bartender or new to the craft, the game offers over 100 real-life cocktail recipes to master in single player campaign or multiplayer co-op modes. Mix, shake, and garnish drinks with precision, honing your skills through intuitive and rewarding gameplay, or attend the bars as a patron and allow your friends to make your favorite cocktails for you in an inviting social environment.

Explore five distinct bars, each with its own unique atmosphere and challenges. From the cozy neighborhood pub to the bustling rooftop lounge, each venue offers a fresh experience, requiring you to adapt and refine your bartending techniques. As you progress, unlock new recipes and venues, eventually earning your place as a legendary mixologist.

The gameplay blends authenticity with arcade-style fun, making it easy to pick up, but challenging to master. Points are earned based on speed and skill, adding a competitive edge as you strive to perfect each order.

description:
Apartment 14-B is a short visual novel set in the same world as Kowloon's Curse.

Follow Fujimoto and Yukimura, two D.I.M.S. agents, as they solve the case of a man who was found dead in his apartment.

Gather evidence, interview suspects, and solve the mystery of Apartment 14-B.

name: 32in24-14: How the Hamburglar Stole Christmas
description:
32in24-14: How the Hamburglar Stole Christmas is the fourteenth edition of the 32in24 series of PWADs, where a 24-hour mapping session is held with the aim of creating a full megawad of usually multiplayer maps - however this time, the maps were designed for single player, making it the first single player 32in24 since Diet, and the first attempt at a full single player megawad since the failed second session. Wary of the increased challenges of creating a single player map over a deathmatch one, mappers were allowed to reuse architecture from previous 32in24 maps to assist them in creating theirs.

Continuing the food and holiday themes introduced by the thirteenth edition, this session was held on 21 December, 2014, and so the maps generally carried a Christmas theme, complete with map titles that mostly referenced either Christmas or food. The subtitle of the session itself refers to a Christmas story by Dr. Seuss As with the previous few sessions, a week was allowed after the session for minor polishing of the maps based on feedback.

name: TTV!Zone Collection 1
description: A large collection of Speed-Maps made during the Tango TV 5 in 100 events. Each Map was made in 100 minutes and had to use a special ingredient. (Decided by Supreme Decider Seele00TextOnly).

name: The Unholy Smoke
description: THE UNHOLY SMOKE is a small, Half Life inspired retro FPS set in a certain desolate city in Finland. Help Jerry through a completely ordinary looking apartment complex which has definitely not suffered from any unmentioned events, in the hopes of reaching his apartment and having his long awaited smoke break.

No jumpscares. The only demons are the horrors that took place ten years ago to the residents of the Luxiang Campus.

Unravel what happened, reach out to the truth and confront the spirits. avoid their attacks in a fast paced bullet-hell gameplay.

You can watch the story that happened within a few days after if the protagonist was defeated in the ruins event that appears in the main game.
After winning the battle, the main plot will be advanced.
※ The defeat will not have any impact on the story after the level is cleared.

All the Australian goodness of the original game with extra koala chaos. Collect together, play hide and seek, race the time attacks, or try out the built in collectible position randomizer.

You swear that you'll not be anyone's lackey forever. You have devised a plan. One that will set you up as the most powerful bird in the universe! well the Undercave Kingdom for sure.

IT'S TIME TO FEED THE TREE AND YOU HOPE IT QUITE LITERALLY CHOKES ON IT!

Go on an adventure to get your toys back!

Elly and her best friend Natalie are children who love toys more than anything else. But when the diabolical engineer Chandra steals the girls' toys, it's up toe Elly to leap into action! Lead Elly through 20 wonderful stages to track down Chandra's army of robots and get your toys back!

name: Harbinger
description: Harbinger brings the chaos of '90s boomer shooters into the modern era. Carve your way through waves of enemies in brutal combat arenas and regroup at the tavern to upgrade your arsenal. Enter the Harbinger Realm and leave nothing in your wake!

name: Helga Deep In Trouble
description: Helga Deep in Trouble is a traditional hand-painted point’n'click adventure game reminiscent of the 90s classics. You will spend your time exploring scenes, picking up items and having branching conversations with other characters. Don’t worry, though – we are aware of the shortcomings of the old adventure games and we’re trying to avoid frustrating elements, such as pixel hunting. The game interface is streamlined and it even offers an (optional) hint system, which tracks your progress and gives you just the one hint you need without spoiling the challenge for you.

name: Ashita Deatta Shoujo
description:
MOONSTONE's debut work follows Aisa Ryu who wakes up to find himself looking up at the sky in the rural village of Takachiho. He soon realizes he has no memory of his past. Confused, he is taken in by his cousin, Kittaka Sanae, and moves into the Tachibana family home, where he meets the four sisters. However, an incident in a neighboring town leads Aoi and the sisters into a series of ongoing murders in this suspense visual novel.

Viewing all endings unlocks short stories for each heroine.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX
description: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX is the first major update to Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3. Based on the Wangan Midnight manga, this game marks the fourth installment in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series and the sixth entry in the overall Wangan Midnight arcade series, which also includes Wangan Midnight R and the 2001 Wangan Midnight video game.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+
description: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+ is an arcade video game inspired by the Wangan Midnight manga. Serving as the second upgrade to the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3 arcade series, following Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX, it is the fifth installment in the overall Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX
description: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX (also known as Maximum Tune 5DX or simply Maxi 5DX) is an arcade racing game developed and published by Namco, based on the Wangan Midnight manga. As the eighth installment in the Wangan Midnight arcade series, this update introduces two foreign car manufacturers, Dodge and Audi, to the Japanese version, which were previously available only in the international versions of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5. Additionally, two courses from the Japanese version of Maximum Tune 5, Sub-Center Ikebukuro and Shinjuku/Shibuya, were introduced to the international version. The game also debuts the new Kobe course.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX+
description:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX+ (also known as Maximum Tune 5DX+ or simply Maxi 5DX+) is an arcade racing game developed and published by Namco, based on the Wangan Midnight manga. As the ninth game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade series and the final update for Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5, this version introduces two new car manufacturers, Lamborghini and Honda, as well as the Hiroshima Expressway course. A new Ghost Battle mode, exclusive to the Japanese and Indonesian versions, allows players to compete against ghosts from other countries, similar to the Japan Challenge in the international versions.

The update was released in North America on January 12, 2022, under the name Maximum Tune 5DX+, skipping the 5DX version for unknown reasons. In this version, the Honda brand is replaced by Acura, its North American counterpart, although many Honda cars remain, except for the Honda S2000, which only appears in the Japan Challenge.

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR+
description:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR+ is an arcade racing game developed and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment, based on the Wangan Midnight manga. As the thirteenth installment in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade series, this game marks the third upgrade to Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6, following the 6 R and 6 RR updates. It was released in Japan on April 17, 2024, with the release date for the Asian version yet to be confirmed.

The game was announced during a live stream celebrating the 20th anniversary of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series.

name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Idle Adventure
description:
The Seven Deadly Sins reborn as cute chibis!
The characters from "The Seven Deadly Sins" have been turned into lovable little chibis! But they haven't gotten any weaker!

name: Race Ace
description: RACE ACE: is based on 100cc Kart Racing. The Track layout is similar in design to circuits at Rye House and Tilbury, two of Britain's tope specialists Karting venues. Experienced drivers lap at speeds of up to 70 mph often inches from the competitors. Wide slick tyres are used to give the lightweight karts phenomenal corning and breaking capabilities demanding split second timing. Race Ace is designed to reflect the closeness and speed of action experienced by kart drivers.

name: Only Climber 2
description: Only Climber is a game to reach the top, created by combining many platform elements. It has a single-player structure in the TPS genre. Feel the challenge in the world of many different themes in this game, which shows that reaching the top has never been this difficult.

name: Ghost Jumper: Red Hoodie
description: "Survive to the end while avoiding terrifying ghosts. "Ghost Jumper is a 2D action casual game where you must survive by avoiding ghosts in the Haunted Forest. Challenge your high score as a cute wolf in a red hood.

name: Escape From Exit 7 of the Theater
description: You're stuck in an infinite loop in the theater. You must escape to exit 7 to open the hidden door. Go forward and find the hidden door.

name: Upload Simulator Silicon
description: Upload Simulator Silicon is an incremental game about uploading, making money, hacking, and ascending as a powerful entity that controls the very laws of the universe using powerful technologies you discover throught your journey.

name: Sons Of The Dream Forest
description: The beautiful and cruel wilderness requires you to learn survival skills, such as building campsites, making tools, hunting, and gathering. You can cut down trees, fish, plant crops, and even collaborate with other players to tackle environmental challenges together

name: Ridge Racer V: Arcade Battle
description:
Ridge Racer V: Arcade Battle is a racing arcade game developed by Namco and released in 2000. It runs on Namco's System 246 hardware and is the ninth installment in the Ridge Racer series. The game is inspired by Ridge Racer V for the Sony PlayStation 2, which was released earlier the same year. In this version, two players can race head-to-head, a reduction from the eight-player support found in Ridge Racer 2 and Rave Racer. Players can choose from six new cars and race on one of five new tracks: "Park Town," "Outer Pass," "Above the City," "Bayside Line," and "Sunny Beach." The "Sunny Beach" track is a shorter version of the original Ridge Racer track, featuring updated graphics.

To activate "Time Trial" mode, players must hold down the "View Change Button" (introduced in Rave Racer) after inserting a coin and keep it pressed until they have selected their car. Once activated, "T.T" will appear on the track selection screen. Ridge Racer V: Arcade Battle marks the final arcade release in the Ridge Racer series.

name: Farting Simulator
description: Get ready for a gut-busting good time with Farting Simulator! You experience the joy of controlling an uncontrollable bodily function in a meme-filled and comedic open-world sandbox environment. Farting Simulator is a hilarious and entertaining adventure that's sure to leave you FARTING out loud.

name: Incel Simulator
description: You are Alex Dysfuctional and you have never had a girlfriend. But maybe it's not too late to change things. The only question is what is closer to you - to try again and again to pump up your body and spirit or to become the king of the incels? Make life-changing decisions and change Alex's life.

name: Sheepers
description: Take on the charming challenge of raising and nurturing a vibrant flock of sheepers.

name: 100 Fantasy Cats
description: 100 Fantasy Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Fantasy themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Fantasy places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: 100 China Cats
description: 100 China Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the China themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of China places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?
