name: Virtual Pet
description: A virtual pet handheld from Han Cheng.

name: 100 Thailand Cats
description: 100 ThailandCats - Join the cutest adventure in the Thailandthemed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Thailand places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: 100 Indonesia Cats
description: 100 Indonesia Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Indonesian themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Indonesia places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: 100 Hidden Cats: Pirates
description: 100 hidden Cats: Pirates is a hidden objects/clicker game. There are 100 pirate crew cats on the map, Your task is to point out all of them.

name: There's No Santa
description: There's no Santa is a hidden object game with a selection of 4 locations and Christmas-themed items to find for each of them.

name: Find Us Cats
description: Find Us Cats is a new hidden object game starring our favorite feline companions! Find dozens of cats in each level and aim for a high score in Level 1 of our free demo, the Planetarium.

name: Cats and Seek: Tokyo
description: The 4th Cats and Seek series is here! We're off to Tokyo to find cats playing all around the city . Can you spot them all?

name: Cats of the Song Dynasty
description: Explore the enchanting world imagined by a Southern Song Dynasty painter and find the adorable cats!

name: Hidden Cats: Zoo
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Zoo" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Gold
description: This is an idle game! You can randomly drop a gold bag when you idle! Click on the gold bag to open it and you can get gold! The value of gold depends on its weight! The heavier it is, the rarer it is!

name: Catcelona
description: A nice, cozy and entertaining video game that mixes Barcelona's architecture and hidden cats. Find them all!

name: Plants Huddled Together
description: An interesting irregular puzzle game featuring beautiful plant illustrations. Come and relax with this game!

name: TimeLab
description: Experience the future of learning and adventure with TimeLab – your knowledge and experience platform for virtual time travel! Immerse yourself in a futuristic world where you can visit historical moments and places with a time simulator.

name: TimeLab: Apollo 11
description: Experience the first moon landing with Apollo 11 as you walk on the lunar surface and witness the breathtaking touchdown of the lunar module on July 20, 1969.

name: TimeLab: Castle Falkenstein
description: In 1883, King Ludwig II of Bavaria, the visionary behind the famous Neuschwanstein Castle, conceived the idea for another building: Castle Falkenstein. Although this project was never realized, we bring his vision to life in a captivating virtual reconstruction.

name: Cats in the Forbidden City
description: Explore the Forbidden City, where Emperor Qianlong resided, and find the adorable cats!

name: Walk in the Park
description: One day, you decide to go to the park with your pet Daisy, to have a relaxing walk under the sunshine. When you are near the park, you notice that the sky starts to get covered with clouds, and as soon as you enter the park, a gust of wind suddenly closes the door, and it seems to be locked. You must find another way to get out of there.

name: Caco Bell
description: Short boom compatible slaughtermap inspired by Garbage's wad, McDoomalds.

name: Turtle Champs
description: Play as a Turtle and duke it out in a game of Football. Use your gun to fly around the field or even shoot the ball.

name: 1-Hour Speedmapping 2018
description:
This is the first in what may be a series of compilations of 1-hour speedmaps.
Maps must be built within a 1 hour time period. You can do testing and bug-fixing after the 1 hour period. The map must be in a playable state and have an exit. Boom and limit-removing (complevel 2+9) format maps allowed. It resulted in 33 maps done by various authors.

name: Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawatareshi Toki
description: The E15 release of Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawatareshi Toki.

name: Turtle Champs: Cosmetics Pass
description:
What is the "Cosmetic Pass" ?
The Cosmetic Pass is an optional DLC that allows players access to the cosmetics that the game provides. These items are all for shows and have no gameplay advantage against others.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow
description:
A port of Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Draw the correct magic seal quickly, or your enemies will never die! Fight and explore through one of the largest castles ever seen in the series! Race another player through custom-made castle rooms in versus mode!

A year has passed since Soma Cruz discovered the evil of Dracula hidden inside his body. Now, a mysterious cult wants to release the power of the Lord of Darkness. As Soma, you must do everything in your power to stop them before it's too late.

name: Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin
description:
A port of Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Explore exotic locales through portals created by the lord of the castle! Switch characters in the heat of action or fight side-by-side using the abilities of both heroes! Battle hordes of enemies and huge bosses in the quest to vanquish evil!

An ancient vampire threatens the fate of the world by utilizing Dracula's accursed castle and mystical paintings to open portals of Death. Battle together as Jonathan Morris, a young man who wields the legendary whip Vampire Killer, and Charlotte Aulin, a spellcaster with tremendous magical abilities. It's time to conquer evil in man's darkest hour.

name: Highline Volleyball VR
description:
Get ready to play volleyball in stunning locations at various times of day.
On the beach, in a stadium arena facing crowds, and more.
Improve your volleyball abilities and tactics through virtual reality and lifelike interactions.

name: Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia
description:
A port of Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Use the brand new Glyph system with over 100 different attack combinations to battle Dracula and his minions throughout 20 explorable areas! Take part in side quests and collect items to power up! Experience a gripping storyline featuring new characters!

In the absence of the Holy Whip, those who live in fear of Dracula seek a replacement, which takes the form of the Order of Ecclesia, an organization that holds the secret to manipulating Glyphs. Shanoa, a young woman possessed with a unique ability to channel Glyphs, is chosen as our protector. This is her destiny and the story of the sacred Order of Ecclesia.

name: Piper
description: A Western take on the story of the Pied Piper of Hamelin, starring Jason David Frank (of Power Rangers fame) as the titular Piper in the town of Midas Valley.

name: StarbaseSim
description:
Operate the Starship space launch system and learn how to catch a rocket to understand what it takes to colonize Mars in this ever-evolving simulation of SpaceX Starbase Texas.

This is a physics sandbox where you can play around with Starbase devices. This is not a flight sim. There are some basic flying mechanics, but they are mainly intended to be able to catch the rockets with the chop sticks.

name: Supermarket Simulator 2024
description:
Welcome to the world of "Supermarket Simulator 2024"! In this thrilling game, you become the owner and restorer of old and abandoned supermarkets. Your mission is to refurbish them, resume operations, and turn them into thriving shopping centers.

In "Supermarket Simulator ," you'll immerse yourself in the exciting world of business and restoration, where every decision you make matters. Are you ready to take on the challenge and turn abandoned supermarkets into thriving enterprises?

name: Might and Magic Mobile II
description:
Might and Magic Mobile II is a role-playing video game developed and released by Gameloft for mobile phones (Java ME platform). It is a prequel to the original Might and Magic Mobile. Like its predecessor, it does not follow the continuity of the core Might and Magic series. This game is based on a castle storm in which you take many roles.
The game was also reskinned with a modified story and setting without the Might and Magic license and released on the Nintendo DSi under the name Legends of Exidia.

name: Home World Run
description: Two baseball playing sisters have been kidnapped by aliens, now they have to use their athletic skills to avoid hazards, solve puzzles, and most importantly bash some slimy creatures to bits in this hand drawn platformer beat-em-up!

name: Flob and the Shattered Dimension
description: Flob and the Shattered Dimension is a platformer game where you can test your skills while traversing various stages filled with challenging obstacles.

name: Decathlon DX
description:
You do it for yourself, your country... and the gold.
All of the individual athletic disciplines are yours - speed, strenght, stamina and the desire to win. But they will all have to come together as one, because you're about to participate in the most prestigious video sporting event in history: Decathlon DX.

name: The Real Face of a VTuber
description: A courtroom investigation visual novel. You play as Prosecutor Justin Truth, investigating a murder at a VTuber agency where that VTuber's real face is the key to cracking the entire case.

name: La Jupo Vania: The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Smile Pinball
description: Sin descripción

name: Who is the Criminal
description: Set in school life, “Who is the Criminal” is a text-based adventure game featuring comedian and inference elements. With inquiring suspects and debating with “evildoers”, he gathers pieces of puzzles and reveals what truly happens in every incident.

name: Wombel
description: A Pengo clone that was released as a type-in listing from issue 12-1 / 1987 of Computer Kontakt dated December 1986 / January 1987.
